src:
Sterke scener i Premier League ‚Äì Tottenham-stjerne gikk gr√•tende av banen
Tottenhams Son Heung-min (27) m√•tte gr√•tende hjelpes av banen etter en takling p√• Evertons Andr√© Gomes.
03 Nov 2019, 18:25 by Petter Fl√∏ttum

Everton ‚Äì Tottenham 1‚Äì1

78 minutter ut i Premier League-oppgj√∏ret p√• Goodison Park, p√• stillingen 0‚Äì1, fors√∏kte Tottenhams Heung-Min √• stoppe Evertons Andr√© Gomes ute ved sidelinjen.
S√∏rkoreaneren skled inn bakfra og sendte Gomes bortover gressmatten, der han kolliderte med Tottenhams Serge Aurier.
I kollisjonen ble Gomes‚Äô h√∏yre fot fanget mellom ballen og Auriers bein, og ankelen ble vridd i en helt unaturlig stilling.
Gomes ble liggende med store smerter, mens b√•de med- og motspillere i umiddelbar n√¶rhet snudde seg bort i avsky da de s√• Everton-spillerens h√∏yre ben.

Leicester fortsetter √• imponere ‚Äì p√• tredjeplass etter sterk seier



Her vris Andr√© Gomes‚Äô h√∏yrefot i sammenst√∏tet med Serge Aurier.üì∑ ANDREW YATES / REUTERS


King senket United ‚Äì etterp√• tok Solskj√¶r selvkritikk

‚Äì Knust og i t√•rer
‚Äì Det der er helt fryktelig, det der er helt fryktelig, sa TV 2-kommentator Kasper Wikestad sekunder etter taklingen.
Son, som f√∏rst fikk gult kort for taklingen, br√∏t sammen i gr√•t ute p√• gressmatten og m√•tte hjelpes ut p√• sidelinjen, da han s√• resultatet: Gomes‚Äô h√∏yre ankel hadde vridd seg s√• foten pekte i en helt gal retning. Aurier ble filmet mens han sto og ba.
Sons lagkamerat Dele Alli forteller at Son satt utr√∏stelig i garderoben etter kampen.
‚Äì Han er knust og i t√•rer, men det er ikke hans skyld. Han er en av de snilleste menneskene jeg vet om, og han ville aldri √∏nsket det der, sier Alli i et intervju vist p√• TV 2.
‚Äì Fotball blir uviktig n√•r noe s√•nt skjer med en av vennene dine, sier Everton-m√•lvakt Jordan Pickford, som forteller at stemningen i Everton-garderoben var trykket etter kampen.
Kort tid etter √• ha gitt det gule kortet, kom Martin Atkinson tilbake til Son og ga ham direkte r√∏dt isteden. Den avgj√∏relsen mener TV 2s Premier League-ekspert Erik Thorstvedt var en bom.
‚Äì Det er veldig rart at ikke VAR kommer inn og gj√∏r noe med det, sier han i kanalens studio etter kampen.
‚Äì Det er helt uforst√•elig. Det er grusomt det som skjer, men Son skal jo ikke v√¶re utvist, istemmer Simen Stams√∏ M√∏ller.
Gomes ble etter noen minutters behandling ute p√• banen, b√•ret ut til en ventende ambulanse ‚Äì til st√•ende ovasjoner fra begge lags supportere.

Liverpool vant etter utrolig snuoperasjon: ‚Äì Den beste f√∏lelsen man kan tenke seg



Dommer Martin Atkins valgte √• gi Son Heung-min r√∏dt kort, etter f√∏rst √• ha gitt ham gult.üì∑ CARL RECINE / REUTERS

Utlignet p√• overtid
Syv minutter p√• overtid stupte Evertons Cenk Tosun inn i feltet, fikk hodet p√• et innlegg og headet in 1‚Äì1.
‚Äì Den var for Andr√© Gomes, skrek kommentator Wikestad.
Alli hadde sendt Tottenham i ledelsen 63 minutter ut i kampen, og med debutant Ryan Sessegnon innp√• i sluttminuttene jaktet Tottenham seiersm√•let. Men da de tolv tilleggsminuttene var over, sto det fremdeles 1‚Äì1.
‚Äì Dette er en kamp som vil bli husket for en fryktelig, fryktelig skade p√• Andr√© Gomes og reaksjonen p√• spillerne rundt da de gikk opp for dem hva som hadde skjedd med deres kollega, oppsummerte TV 2-kommentatoren etter kampslutt.
Tottenham er dermed nummer elleve med 13 poeng p√• elleve kamper, mens Everton er p√• 17.-plass med elleve poeng p√• like mange kamper.
text:
Strong Premier League scenes - Tottenham star wept off the pitch
Tottenham's Son Heung-min (27) had to cry out for help after a tackle on Everton's Andr√© Gomes.
03 Nov 2019, 18:25 by Petter Fl√∏ttum

Everton - Tottenham 1‚Äì1

78 minutes into the Premier League settlement at Goodison Park, at 0-1, Tottenham's Heung-Min tried to stop Everton's Andr√© Gomes from the sidelines.
The South Korean slid in from behind and sent Gomes over the grass mat, clashing with Tottenham's Serge Aurier.
In the collision, Gomes' right foot was caught between the ball and Aurier's leg, and his ankle was twisted in a completely unnatural position.
Gomes was left in great pain, while both fellows and opponents in the immediate vicinity turned away in disgust as they saw the Everton player's right leg.

Leicester continue to impress - in third place after strong victory



Here Andr√© Gomes' right foot is twisted in the clash with Serge Aurier.üì∑ ANDREW YATES / REUTERS


King sunk United - afterwards, Solskj√¶r took self-criticism

- Crushed and in tears
"That is absolutely horrible, that is absolutely horrible," TV 2 commentator Kasper Wikestad said seconds after the deal.
Son, who first got a yellow card for the tackle, collapsed crying out on the grass mat and had to be helped out on the sideline when he saw the result: Gomes' right ankle had twisted so his foot was pointing in a completely wrong direction. Aurier was filmed as he prayed.
Son's teammate Dele Alli says that Son sat inconsolably in the wardrobe after the match.
- He's crushed and in tears, but it's not his fault. He is one of the kindest people I know of, and he would never have wanted it there, Alli says in an interview shown on TV 2.
- Football becomes unimportant when something like that happens to one of your friends, says Everton goalkeeper Jordan Pickford, who says the mood in the Everton wardrobe was depressed after the game.
Shortly after giving the yellow card, Martin Atkinson returned to Son and gave him direct red instead. That decision believes TV 2's Premier League expert Erik Thorstvedt was a bomb.
- It's very strange that VAR doesn't come in and do something about it, he says in the channel's studio after the match.
- It's completely incomprehensible. That is cruel, but Son should not have been expelled, says Simen Stams√∏ M√∏ller.
After a few minutes of treatment on the field, Gomes was carried out to a waiting ambulance - to standing ovations from both teams' supporters.

Liverpool won after incredible turnaround: - The best feeling imaginable



Referee Martin Atkins chose to give Son Heung-my red card, after first giving him yellow.üì∑ CARL RECINE / REUTERS

Offset in overtime
Seven minutes into overtime, Everton's Cenk Tosun plunged into the field, got his head on a post and headed in 1-1.
- It was for Andr√© Gomes, screamed commentator Wikestad.
Alli had sent Tottenham in the lead 63 minutes into the match, and with debutant Ryan Sessegnon inside in the final minutes, Tottenham chased the victory goal. But by the time the twelve extra minutes were over, it was still 1-1.
- This is a match that will be remembered for a terrible, horrible injury to Andr√© Gomes and the reaction on the players around when they revealed to them what had happened to their colleague, the TV 2 commentator summed up after the end of the match.
Tottenham is thus number eleven with 13 points in eleven matches, while Everton are in 17th place with eleven points in just as many matches.
